{"id":916172047,"question_id":665,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1678959177,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/916172047/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean checkPossibility(int[] nums) {\n        boolean seen = false;\n        \n        int i=0, j=1;\n        for(; i<nums.length; ){\n            if(nums[i]>nums[j]){\n                if(seen)\n                    return false;\n                else {\n                    seen=true;\n                    i--;\n                    continue;\n                }\n                \n            }\n            \n            i++;\n            j++;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
